LightningComponentBundle.description: A nice and intuitive way to select the time

property.name: minuteValue
property.label: Minute Value
property.description: The minute value (00-59). Can be used as a default value and output.

property.name: hourValue
property.label: Hour Value
property.description: The hour value (00-23, in 24-hour format). Can be used as a default value and output.

property.name: ampmValue
property.label: PM Value
property.description: If true, the selected time is PM; if false, it is AM.

property.name: is24HourFormat
property.label: Use 24-Hour Time Format
property.description: If true, use 24-hour format; otherwise, use 12-hour format with AM/PM.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Label to display above the time picker.

property.name: isRequired
property.label: Required
property.description: If true, the time picker is required.
